page.title: 04MRS.FREEMAN REMEMBERS.
page.content: Mrs.Freeman is 71 years old. The house where she lives now is 11 years old but the surrounding houses are 40 years old. People at Lydbrook walked to Joys Green to school as Lydbrook School was not built.There were 7 teachers and a headmaster.The cane was used.The school was spotless.The girls walked to Lydbrook for cookery classes.Things were cheap,1penny worth of sweets was equal to 30p today.They used to play "Hen & Chicks".She did knitting and sewed rag dolls.There are only 3 teachers in our school today.The cane is never used and we have a headmistress. The boys and girls do sewing and cooking.Mrs.Freeman likes to arrange flowers.She goes to a club for the elderly called the "Autumn Leaves".They go to places like Cardiff and Jersey.
